definition: inferior/not up to par/to fall far short/to be mistaken
difference/discrepancy/to differ/error/to err/to make a mistake
to differ from/to fall short of/lacking/wrong/inferior/Taiwan pr. [cha1]
to send/to commission/messenger/mission
to distance oneself from (classical)
far/distant/remote/(intensifier in a comparison) by far/much (lower etc)

sentences.english: My own car is not nearly as nice as yours.
sentences.chinese: 我自己的车比你的差远了。

sentences.english: Wathing the match on TV is far different from at scene.
sentences.chinese: 从电视上观看那个比赛比现场观看可差远了。

sentences.english: I'm saying our thought and view have a great difference, completely not similar.
sentences.chinese: 我说我们的思想看法差远了，并不相似。

sentences.english: I'm still a long way from finishing the assignment due tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 明天就要交作业了，可我离做完还差远呢？

sentences.english: Watch the event on television was poor substitute for actually there.
sentences.chinese: 从电视上观看那个比赛比现场观看差远了。

sentences.english: The local bus service was a poor substitute for their car.
sentences.chinese: 他们坐当地的公交车，这比坐自己的汽车可差远了。

sentences.english: They're dancing much better than us.
sentences.chinese: 我们可是跳得比他们差远了。

sentences.english: My English is not half as yours.
And he was nothing to what his father had been.
sentences.chinese: 他同他的父亲比起来，可是差远了。

sentences.english: Your English is much better than mine.
Watching a live competition is clearer than watching from Tv.
sentences.chinese: 从电视上观看那个比赛比现场观看可差远了。

sentences.english: Before has tried a 30-40 dollar bottle, the taste difference was far.
sentences.chinese: 以前试过三四十块钱一瓶的，口味差远了。

definition: fall short by a large amount
unlike
comparable
not up to much/very indifferent/nothing great about it/nothing good to be said about it
not to be inferior in any aspects (idiom)/to surpass/to outdo/(derog.) to be even worse
pinyin: you3 guo4 zhi1 er2 wu2 bu4 ji2

definition: lit. mustn't speak of two things on the same day (idiom); not to be mentioned in the same breath/incomparable
pinyin: bu4 ke3 tong2 ri4 er2 yu3

definition: lit. minor magician in the presence of a great one (idiom)/fig. to pale into insignificance by comparison
lit. to have no time for civilities (idiom)/fig. not to be outdone/not to yield to one's opponents
not inferior in any respect
equally matched/about the same
not bad/OK
to not lack
eager to excel/eager to get ahead in life/strong-minded
(dialect) not that great/not up to much/nothing special
bad/no good/below average/disappointing
rude/impertinent
(coll.) not bad/good/fine
